results.title: Fundamentals of acoustics
results.brief_description: The phenomena of hearing, and the modification of sound between its source and its hearer are studied. The velocity of sound, refraction, range of hearing, lowering of intensity, attenuation in air, the elimination of high and low frequencies, reverberation, and the focussing of sound are dealt with in detail.

results.title: Fundamentals in photography: elementary optics in photography
results.brief_description: This film explains the principles of lighting effects; how light is reflected and refracted by the curvature and thickness of glass.

results.title: Fundamental concepts (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Fluid Dynamics of Drag”.
Professor Ascher M. Shapiro introduces concepts of continuous fluid, density and velocity at a point, body forces, surface forces, pressure, pressure gradient, viscous stress, viscosity; equations of fluid motion; limiting cases of low and high viscosity; Reynolds Number and dynamical similarity; pressure drag, friction drag and total drag.
results.description:

results.title: Fundamental canoeing
results.creator_credit: Norman Keziere, Joe Hayward and Moreland-Latchford Productions

results.title: Function of digestion (TEFC)
results.brief_description: A study of the digestive organs and the theory of digestion. Filmed experiments on rabbits discount the mechanical hypotheses of digestion and the effect of saliva on bread, changing starch to glucose, demonstrates the action of digestive enzymes. The wall of the intestine is also shown.

results.title: Fun radio!
results.brief_description: A casual glance at the Australian summer weekend. A troupe of pop singers is greeted at the airport by a large crowd. In the suburbs people are seen at their homes. Life in Melbourne is seen as a great religious festival, complete with rituals, taboos and minor deities.

results.title: Fun on foot
results.creator_credit: Jim Harmon, John King, Paul Franklin, Bjorn Kjellstrom, Helene Huculak, I.M.S. and National Hiking and Ski Touring Association
results.brief_description: A concept montage film on feet in action. From bush-walking to running to skipping and dancing - a tribute to feet and where they’re going. Produced in support of the Fun on Foot program.
